about.description: Deadlock Mod Manager es una herramiento de instalaci√≥n y manego de mods para el juego "Deadlock", de Valve.

about.gamebananaDescription: Nuestra primera fuente de Mods y la base de nuestra aplicaci√≥n. GameBanana proporciona la base de datos de Mods y la API integral que hacen posible explorar, descubrir y descargar mods de Deadlock.

about.tauriDescription: El potente framework que hace posible esta aplicaci√≥n de escritorio multiplataforma. Tauri combina lo mejor de las tecnolog√≠as web con el rendimiento y la seguridad nativos.

onboarding.title: Bienvenido a Deadlock Mod Manager
onboarding.welcome: ¬°Te ayudaremos a configurar {{appName}}! Esta configuraci√≥n r√°pida te ayudar√° a empezar.

background.detailedDescription: This plugin allows you to set custom background images for the entire application. You can use either a URL to an online image or upload a local image file. The plugin supports opacity and blur effects to customize the appearance. You can also choose whether to include the sidebar in the background effect.
background.title: Background
background.usageInstructions: To use this plugin: 1) Enable the plugin using the toggle, 2) Enter an image URL or click 'Choose Image' to upload a local file, 3) Adjust opacity and blur settings as desired, 4) Optionally enable 'Include sidebar' to apply the background to the sidebar as well.

bloodmoon.description: A dark theme with black-red gradients and crimson accents.

discord.applicationIdDescription: No setup required: this plugin uses our official Discord application.
discord.description: Shows your Deadlock activity on Discord.
discord.detailedDescription: Displays your Deadlock activity on Discord using Rich Presence. Simply enable the plugin and optionally customize the Details and State text visible on your profile.
discord.setupStep1: Visit the Discord Developer Portal and create a new application
discord.setupStep2: Copy your Application ID from the 'General Information' page
discord.setupStep3: Upload images as Rich Presence assets with matching key names
discord.setupStep4: Paste your Application ID above and enable the plugin
discord.showElapsedTimeDescription: Display how long you've been using the mod manager
discord.title: Discord Rich Presence
discord.usageInstructions: Enable the plugin, then optionally edit the Details and State text.

flashbang.description: Force Light Mode during a scheduled time window.
flashbang.detailedDescription: Flashbang mode switches the app to Light Mode during the configured hours, regardless of your theme setting.
flashbang.title: Flashbang Mode
flashbang.usageInstructions: Enable the plugin and choose start and end hour (0‚Äì23).

nightshift.description: A teal-accented cyberpunk theme designed for clarity and long gaming sessions.

plugins.renderActive: Plugin is active and running in the background

sudo.description: Advanced mod management tools for experienced users.
sudo.detailedDescription: Unlocks developer-oriented controls and experimental features. Some actions can modify files or bypass safeguards. Use with caution.
sudo.instructions: Browse mods on the left, select one, then use the right arrow to download and enable it. Select an installed mod on the right and use the left arrow to remove it. You can search both lists.
sudo.title: Superuser
sudo.usageInstructions: Enable the plugin to turn on Superuser Mode. Developer options and advanced tools become visible across the app. Disable the plugin to hide them again.

tea.description: Un tema beige acogedor creado para el YouTuber y streamer de Twitch Snipztea.

themes.usageInstructions: Open the plugin, choose a preset under 'Pre-defined Themes', then press Activate. Press Deactivate to return to the default look.

0.10.1.title: Correcciones de VPK e Importaci√≥n de Perfiles
features: üîß Corregida la numeraci√≥n de VPK para llenar espacios secuencialmente en lugar de agregar al final

üõ†Ô∏è Developer mode toggle with dedicated developer tools page for mod creators
üîå Comprehensive plugin system - Background customization, Discord Rich Presence, Flashbang (scheduled light mode), Themes (including Nightshift), and Sudo (mod conflict detection)
üé® New Bloodmoon theme with black-red gradients and crimson accents
üìÅ Folder-based profile management for better organization
üîÑ VPK file replacement feature for rapid mod development iteration
üì• Overhauled download system for better performance and reliability
‚öôÔ∏è Experimental features UI with user-specific feature flag overrides
